ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in Wi-Fi allows you to wirelessly transfer your images to social networking sites through CANON iMAGE GATEWAY
8x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle lens delivers stunning images and allows you to capture more in your frame
16.0 Megapixel sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver exceptional performance
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 32 predefined shooting situations for capturing spectacular images with ease
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 130 IS 16.0MP Wi-Fi Digital Camera - Silver + 8GB Memory Card + Multi Card Reader/Writer + Digital Camera Case Black + Accessory Kit
